column2: Formulate an ontology related to material. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/material#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Material a owl:Class .:Metal a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Polymer a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Composite a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Property a owl:Class .:Density a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Property .:Conductivity a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Property .:hasProperty a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Material ;    rdfs:range :Property .:Steel a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Metal .:Aluminum a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Metal .:Plastic a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Polymer .:CarbonFiberComposite a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Composite .:hasDensity a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Material ;    rdfs:range rdf:Literal .:hasConductivity a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Material ;    rdfs:range rdf:Literal .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: material. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/material#> .ex:Material a owl:Class .ex:Metal a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Material .ex:NonMetal a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Material .ex:Polymer a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Material .ex:Composite a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Material .ex:Iron a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Metal .ex:Aluminium a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Metal .ex:Copper a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Metal .ex:Wood a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:NonMetal .ex:Ceramic a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:NonMetal .ex:Thermoplastic a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Polymer .ex:Thermosetting a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Polymer .ex:FiberReinforced a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Composite .ex:ParticleReinforced a owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Composite .ex:hasDensity a owl:DatatypeProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Material ; rdfs:range <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .ex:hasConductivity a owl:DatatypeProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Material ; rdfs:range <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .ex:isMadeOf a owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Composite ; rdfs:range ex:Material .# Instancesex:SpecificIron a ex:Iron ; ex:hasDensity "7.87"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> ; ex:hasConductivity "59.6"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .ex:SpecificWood a ex:Wood ; ex:hasDensity "0.6"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> ; ex:hasConductivity "0.15"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: material.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/material#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Material a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Material" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing any type of material." .:Metal a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Metal" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing metallic materials." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Plastic a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Plastic" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing plastic materials." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Glass a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Glass" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing glass materials." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:Wood a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Wood" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing wooden materials." ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Material .:hasDensity a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has density" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a material to its density value." ;    rdfs:domain :Material ;    rdfs:range xsd:float .:hasColor a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has color" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a material to its color." ;    rdfs:domain :Material ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .```
